title: Digestive Pipeline
description: Agent-assisted claim extraction from raw artifacts. Takes transcripts/links/text, operationalizes into claims with gates, links to existing claim IDs or creates new ones.

title: Custom API domain
description: Set up api.roadstoagi.org pointing to the Worker instead of moritzbierling.workers.dev

title: Share Packs
description: Social distribution blocks for roads/claims. Thread format for X, DM pack for messaging, email blocks for forwards. One-click copy with proper formatting.
